sourcesContent:
function Statements({ statements }) { return (

Your representative published a total of {statements.num_results} during the {statements.congress}th . These are the {sponsoredBills.sponsoredLegislation.length} most recent:

{sponsoredBills.sponsoredLegislation && sponsoredBills.sponsoredLegislation.map((bill, index) => (
{`${bill.type}-${bill.number}`}
Introduced {bill.introducedDate}
Bill Title {bill.title}
Latest Action {`${bill.latestAction.text} (${bill.latestAction.actionDate})`}
))}
); } export default Statements;
